comment: Awesome class, awesome instructor. Pretty too.
Professor Levy is one of the best teachers I’ve had! She’s so down to earth. Just do all your assignments and I you’ll get an A. Fun class even at 8:00AM.

She is a professor at SPSU & KSU (soon to be the same) and I took her class at SPSU. She is super nice, funny, and laid-back. My class constantly trolled her and she loved it. She grades fairly and gives you chances to improve and get a higher grade. She also gets the class into interesting topic conversations. I loved having her!

Awesome! She won't catch you on every grammar mistake, because she's more into your effort and creativity. She's a great prof. Really nice and helpful. Made the summer class fun. 4 essays no problems. SHE IS SUPER RAD. Take her if you enjoy writing or even if it isn't your strong suit. She will help you out no matter what. AMAZING!

She was amazing. She understands when people have problems and turn things in late. She is also sooo cute when she tells you about her personal life. I really loved this teacher and I hope she will teach 1102.

I took Levy for English 1102 online this past semester. She is a great teacher and I enjoyed her class. I would definitely take her again. 4 Essays and a couple of homework assignments. She grades very fairly and gives feedback in a fairly timely manner.

Prof. Levy is so cute and fun! I really enjoyed her class. She loves writing and is very passionate about finding your own writing style/voice. We used the book some, but not much. She does give you a large creative license, which is nice. I would definitely take her class again and would recommend her to anyone. She is very approachable as well.

We all have to take this class, so it might as well be with someone who'll empower you to enjoy it.  Levy is chill and very easy to talk to.  She has workshops/sessions one on one to help everyone or to confirm your progress.
